View Javadoc
1   package org.dayatang.cache.redis;
2   
3   import org.dayatang.cache.Cache;
4   import org.junit.Ignore;
5   import org.junit.Test;
6   
7   import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
8   
9   /**
10   * Created by lingen on 14-7-15.
11   */
12  @Ignore("测试此类前，需要先启动一个Redis服务")
13  public class RedisBasedCacheTest {
14  
15      private Cache cache = new RedisBasedCache("127.0.0.1",6379);
16  
17      @Test
18      public void test(){
19          cache.put("abc", "abc");
20          assertTrue(cache.get("abc").equals("abc"));
21      }
22  
23      @Test
24      public void test2(){
25          Person person = new Person();
26          person.setName("lingen");
27          person.setAge(12);
28  
29          cache.put("A",person);
30          Person person1 = (Person) cache.get("A");
31          assertTrue(person1.getName().equals(person.getName()));
32          assertTrue(person1.getAge()==person.getAge());
33      }
34  
35      @Test
36      public void testRemoe(){
37          String key ="ABC";
38          cache.put(key,"AAA");
39          assertTrue(cache.get(key).equals("AAA"));
40          cache.remove(key);
41          assertTrue(cache.containsKey(key)==false);
42      }
43  
44      @Test
45      public void testExpired() throws InterruptedException {
46          String key = "ABC";
47          cache.put(key,"afdsa",5);
48          System.out.print(cache.get(key));
49          assertTrue(cache.get(key)!=null);
50          Thread.sleep(6*1000);
51          assertTrue(cache.get(key)==null);
52  
53      }
54  
55  }
